Text: Thanks analogreflections. I was wondering about that "Home taping is killing music". It makes me think of when the RIAA used to put those kind of messages on LP inner sleeves in the 70's. Sure made a lot of mix tapes back then. (showing my age)

You're most welcome. :) I'm 32 and in my time taping music to cassettes was the best thing :)
I still have lot of music on tapes, not so many records though. I don't remember when they used to put these, but it certainly bring back memories :) cheers, mate.

I was curious and dug through some vinyl. I found this inner sleeve on my Rush 2112 album. I scanned it. Pretty long read, but it's an example from 1976.
http://postimg.org/image/3m6namu2n/
Almost 40 years, and they still didnt solve 'piracy problem' lol... today piracy is stronger than ever ;)
